abstract: Addressing speculation that a bidder might emerge for the pan-European share trading platform Chi-X Europe, the company said Monday that it had received an expression of interest from an unidentified third party.
snippet: Addressing speculation that a bidder might emerge for the pan-European share trading platform Chi-X Europe, the company said Monday that it had received an expression of interest from an unidentified third party.
lead_paragraph: Addressing rampant speculation that a bidder might emerge for the pan-European share trading platform Chi-X Europe, the company acknowledged Monday that it had received an expression of interest from an unidentified third party.

headline.main: Chi-X Acknowledges an Approach by Potential Bidder
